summary: Completed frontend testing of Fee Management dialogs and Courses page filters. All 6 test cases PASSED. Verified: 1) Single Fee Dialog reverted (no search bar), 2) Bulk Fee Dialog has search bar, 3) Admission Charges Dialog has search bar, 4) Courses page has single search bar, 5) Course filter dropdown has search functionality, 6) Fee Range filter has correct '1st Year' options.

critical_code_review_comments: getFirstYearFees function correctly calculates: Year 1 for annual OR Sem 1 + Sem 2 for semester courses
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 15 tested the specific reverts and new features requested by user: 1) Single Fee Dialog reverted to original without search bar - VERIFIED. 2) Bulk Fee Dialog and Admission Charges Dialog have search bars above course dropdowns - VERIFIED. 3) Courses page has single search bar - VERIFIED. 4) Course filter dropdown has search functionality inside - VERIFIED. 5) Fee Range filter has '1st Year < ₹1L', '1st Year < ₹2L', '1st Year > ₹2L' options that filter by First Year fees only (Year 1 for annual OR Sem 1 + Sem 2 for semester) - VERIFIED.
